short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the elegance and power of Lamborghini to your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension transforms your new tab background with stunning, high-resolution images of iconic Lamborghini models. Featuring a variety of legendary cars, from the Aventador and Hurac√°n to the latest releases, you'll feel the thrill of Lamborghini every time you open a new tab.

Key Features:
- Notepad
- ToDo
- Links
- Apps
- History
- Bookmarks
- Downloads
- Search box
- Clock
